attributes.action: Deploy the British Army to restore and maintain order on the streets
attributes.additional_details:
The Police don't have the manpower or the resources to deal with trouble like this, the kids don't respect them because they know they are powerless to stop the madness.

We have brave men and women on the streets doing what they can, police commanders are not trained or experienced in dealing with widespread disorder like this.

It is time to take respect back, by force.  These fools understand little, however they do understand force.  If there was some reason to be scared, to fear those who would stand up and say no, we wouldn't be in this mess.
